comment: too much glitches, getting back to homescreen after choosing a picture, and please, fix video flickering problem after exporting, ive been sending reports and got no replies, also no solution, 0 user service, 0 solution, absolute 0 for everything.
scenarios: After choosing a picture in the app, the user gets returned to the home screen.
After exporting a video, the video has a flickering problem.
key sentence: After choosing a picture in the app, the user gets returned to the home screen.
the function of activity: This activity allows users to switch media categories, select specific items, view thumbnails, and proceed after selections.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Media Tab', 'description': 'Switch between different media categories such as photos or videos.'}, {'name': 'Select Media', 'description': 'Individually select specific media items from the gallery.'}, {'name': 'View Thumbnails', 'description': 'Display thumbnail views of images and videos in the gallery.'}, {'name': 'Next Action', 'description': 'Proceed to the next step or screen after making selections.'}]
